effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.platinum: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user’s Attack.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user’s Attack.
